item.title: Mamata open to working with Jaya Maya but not with Modi
item.description: Trinamool Congress supremo Mamata Banerjee on Thursday indicated that she was open to working with AIADMK chief Jayalalithaa or BSP leader Mayawati in the post poll scenario but dismissed any possibility of supporting a Narendra Modiled government
item.itunes:subtitle: Trinamool Congress supremo Mamata Banerjee on Thursday indicated that she was open to working with AIADMK chief Jayalalithaa or BSP leader Mayawati in the post poll scenario but dismissed any possibility of supporting a Narendra Modiled government &n
item.itunes:summary: Trinamool Congress supremo Mamata Banerjee on Thursday indicated that she was open to working with AIADMK chief Jayalalithaa or BSP leader Mayawati in the post poll scenario but dismissed any possibility of supporting a Narendra Modiled government

item.title: Delhi ExCM Kejriwal overstays in official bungalow PWD scared to send notice
item.description: Former Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal who has batted for honesty and intergrity in public life has not vacated his official bungalow CII23 at Tilak Lane despite the completion of the 15day grace period
item.itunes:subtitle: Former Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal who has batted for honesty and intergrity in public life has not vacated his official bungalow CII23 at Tilak Lane despite the completion of the 15day grace period
item.itunes:summary: Former Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal who has batted for honesty and intergrity in public life has not vacated his official bungalow CII23 at Tilak Lane despite the completion of the 15day grace period

item.title: Prima facie Kejriwal violated Model Code EC
item.description: The Election Commission on Thursday said prima facie AAP leader Arvind Kejriwal violated the Model Code of Conduct by not seeking prior police permission before holding his road show in Gujarat on Wednesday
item.itunes:subtitle: The Election Commission on Thursday said prima facie AAP leader Arvind Kejriwal violated the Model Code of Conduct by not seeking prior police permission before holding his road show in Gujarat on Wednesday
item.itunes:summary: The Election Commission on Thursday said prima facie AAP leader Arvind Kejriwal violated the Model Code of Conduct by not seeking prior police permission before holding his road show in Gujarat on Wednesday

item.title: Left walks out of AIADMK alliance gets DMK invitation
item.description: Left out of the scheme her things by AIADMK supremo J Jayalalithaa the Left parties on Thursday announced breaking of alliance with AIADMK DMK invited Left parties to DMK fold
item.itunes:subtitle: Left out of the scheme her things by AIADMK supremo J Jayalalithaa the Left parties on Thursday announced breaking of alliance with AIADMK DMK invited Left parties to DMK fold
item.itunes:summary: Left out of the scheme her things by AIADMK supremo J Jayalalithaa the Left parties on Thursday announced breaking of alliance with AIADMK DMK invited Left parties to DMK fold

item.title: CBSEs Class 12 physics question paper leaked reexam in Manipur
item.description: The Class 12 examination of the Central Board of Secondary Education has landed in a controversy after Wednesdays Physics test was leaked in Manipur Making matters worse a local newspaper in Imphal uploaded the leaked papers online
item.itunes:subtitle: The Class 12 examination of the Central Board of Secondary Education has landed in a controversy after Wednesdays Physics test was leaked in Manipur Making matters worse a local newspaper in Imphal uploaded the leaked papers online
item.itunes:summary: The Class 12 examination of the Central Board of Secondary Education has landed in a controversy after Wednesdays Physics test was leaked in Manipur Making matters worse a local newspaper in Imphal uploaded the leaked papers online

item.title: LinkedIn profile helps Bangalore cops nab Delhi prof for stealing laptop
item.description: A Delhibased professor who walked away with an unattended laptop at the Bangalore airport only to be caught several days later has found to his great dismay that he was done in by his profile on LinkedIn
item.itunes:subtitle: A Delhibased professor who walked away with an unattended laptop at the Bangalore airport only to be caught several days later has found to his great dismay that he was done in by his profile on LinkedIn
item.itunes:summary: A Delhibased professor who walked away with an unattended laptop at the Bangalore airport only to be caught several days later has found to his great dismay that he was done in by his profile on LinkedIn

item.title: Teacher molests minor sisters circulates video
item.description: A teacher at a private school in Dhanbad has been accused of sexually assaulting two minor girls recording obscene MMS videos of them and taking their pictures which he circulated among people
item.itunes:subtitle: A teacher at a private school in Dhanbad has been accused of sexually assaulting two minor girls recording obscene MMS videos of them and taking their pictures which he circulated among people
item.itunes:summary: A teacher at a private school in Dhanbad has been accused of sexually assaulting two minor girls recording obscene MMS videos of them and taking their pictures which he circulated among people

item.title: March 6 2014 The day in news
item.description: News happened as you were on the go News is happening even as you read this Here is how we ensures you dont miss anything Visit HT your onestop destination for the days wrapup of news

item.title: AAP donations peak after Kejriwals detention clashes
item.description: Every time the Aam Aadmi Party AAP is cornered the support is not only seen on streets The partys cash boxes also start jingling with donations
item.itunes:subtitle: Every time the Aam Aadmi Party AAP is cornered the support is not only seen on streets The partys cash boxes also start jingling with donations

item.title: UP drops sedition charges againstnbsp JK students after political storm
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh government on Thursday withdrew sedition charges it slapped on 67 students from Kashmir for cheering Pakistans victory over archrivals India in an Asia Cup cricket match held on Sunday
item.itunes:subtitle: The Uttar Pradesh government on Thursday withdrew sedition charges it slapped on 67 students from Kashmir for cheering Pakistans victory over archrivals India in an Asia Cup cricket match held on Sunday
item.itunes:summary: The Uttar Pradesh government on Thursday withdrew sedition charges it slapped on 67 students from Kashmir for cheering Pakistans victory over archrivals India in an Asia Cup cricket match held on Sunday

item.title: Delhi Assembly not dissolved in public interest Centre to SC
item.description: The Centre on Thursday justified before the Supreme Court that its decision not to dissolve the Delhi Assembly after the resignation of Arvind Kejriwal as chief minister was taken in public interest as there was a possibility of BJP staking claim to form a government
item.itunes:subtitle: The Centre on Thursday justified before the Supreme Court that its decision not to dissolve the Delhi Assembly after the resignation of Arvind Kejriwal as chief minister was taken in public interest as there was a possibility of BJP staking claim to form
item.itunes:summary: The Centre on Thursday justified before the Supreme Court that its decision not to dissolve the Delhi Assembly after the resignation of Arvind Kejriwal as chief minister was taken in public interest as there was a possibility of BJP staking claim to form a government

item.title: Rahul casts the net to catch fisherfolk votes
item.description: Interacting informally with around 250 fishermen and fisherwomen at the Versova Beach under a blazing sun Gandhi was blessed by an elderly fisherwoman while others expressed their desire to see him as Indias prime minister
item.itunes:subtitle: Interacting informally with around 250 fishermen and fisherwomen at the Versova Beach under a blazing sun Gandhi was blessed by an elderly fisherwoman while others expressed their desire to see him as Indias prime minister
item.itunes:summary: Interacting informally with around 250 fishermen and fisherwomen at the Versova Beach under a blazing sun Gandhi was blessed by an elderly fisherwoman while others expressed their desire to see him as Indias prime minister

item.title: AAP leader Manish Sisodias car attacked in Gujarat
item.description: A day after clashes broke out between workers of the Aam Aadmi Party and the Bharatiya Janata Party AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal claimed Manish Sisodias car was attacked in a Gujarat town on Thursday evening
item.itunes:subtitle: A day after clashes broke out between workers of the Aam Aadmi Party and the Bharatiya Janata Party AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal claimed Manish Sisodias car was attacked in a Gujarat town on Thursday evening

item.title: Clash with BJP has tarnished AAPs image HT web poll
item.description: Wednesdays clash between workers of the Aam Aadmi Party and the Bharatiya Janata Party in the streets of the national capital has hit the image of the Arvind Kejriwalled outfit a web poll conducted by HT showed on Thursday
item.itunes:subtitle: Wednesdays clash between workers of the Aam Aadmi Party and the Bharatiya Janata Party in the streets of the national capital has hit the image of the Arvind Kejriwalled outfit a web poll conducted by HT showed on Thursday

item.title: AAP goes regional while keeping its focus on national
item.description: AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal on his four day visit to Gujarat strategically decided to attack the incumbent governments on their failures in their home states on local issues
item.itunes:subtitle: AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal on his four day visit to Gujarat strategically decided to attack the incumbent governments on their failures in their home states on local issues
item.itunes:summary: AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal on his four day visit to Gujarat strategically decided to attack the incumbent governments on their failures in their home states on local issues

item.title: Jet Airways Passenger allowed to travel with wrong boarding pass
item.description: In a major security lapse a Jet Airways passenger travelled from Delhi to Mumbai on a boarding card issued in someone elses name The incident took place on March 4
item.itunes:subtitle: In a major security lapse a Jet Airways passenger travelled from Delhi to Mumbai on a boarding card issued in someone elses name The incident took place on March 4
item.itunes:summary: In a major security lapse a Jet Airways passenger travelled from Delhi to Mumbai on a boarding card issued in someone elses name The incident took place on March 4

item.title: Cong welcomes Kejriwals visit to Guj hails him for exposing Modis development myth
item.description: Congress on Thursday hailed Arvind Kejriwals tour of Gujarat contending that there is another voice in the country exposing the deficiencies and development myth of Narendra Modi Full Coverage Modi Kejriwal
item.itunes:subtitle: Congress on Thursday hailed Arvind Kejriwals tour of Gujarat contending that there is another voice in the country exposing the deficiencies and development myth of Narendra Modi Full Coverage Modi Kejriwal

item.title: 34 of 70 LS candidates with criminal record get tickets again
item.description: Thirtyfour of the 203 Lok Sabha election candidates named by various political outfits so far have criminal cases they declared in previous elections the Association for Democratic Reforms said on Thursday
item.itunes:subtitle: Thirtyfour of the 203 Lok Sabha election candidates named by various political outfits so far have criminal cases they declared in previous elections the Association for Democratic Reforms said on Thursday
item.itunes:summary: Thirtyfour of the 203 Lok Sabha election candidates named by various political outfits so far have criminal cases they declared in previous elections the Association for Democratic Reforms said on Thursday

item.title: 130 hrs and still on Ukhand Prof breaks Guinness nonstop lecture record
item.description: Done it A Deharadun university professor broke the Guinness books 121hour nonstop lecture record at 7am on Thursday and chose to continue till the clock sounded 170 hours
item.itunes:subtitle: Done it A Deharadun university professor broke the Guinness books 121hour nonstop lecture record at 7am on Thursday and chose to continue till the clock sounded 170 hours
item.itunes:summary: Done it A Deharadun university professor broke the Guinness books 121hour nonstop lecture record at 7am on Thursday and chose to continue till the clock sounded 170 hours

item.title: Chinas expanding rail network in Tibet comes close to Sikkim
item.description: China has extended its rail network in Tibet up to Xigaze close to the Indian border in Sikkim a step that would provide its military a strategic capability to easily move troops and weapons in the remote Himalayan region
item.itunes:subtitle: China has extended its rail network in Tibet up to Xigaze close to the Indian border in Sikkim a step that would provide its military a strategic capability to easily move troops and weapons in the remote Himalayan region
item.itunes:summary: China has extended its rail network in Tibet up to Xigaze close to the Indian border in Sikkim a step that would provide its military a strategic capability to easily move troops and weapons in the remote Himalayan region

item.title: Anarchists or agitators Top 10 Aam Aadmi Party controversies
item.description: The AAP is known to be combative but Wednesdays unprecedented clashes have again put it under spotlight Here is a look at 10 other events and moments that have made the rookie partys journey resemble a rollercoaster ridenbspKejriwal apologises for violencenbsp AAP donations peak after Kejriwals detention clashes

item.title: Gadkari describes Saamna editorial as unfortunate
item.description: Former BJP president Nitin Gadkari on Thursday described the Saamna editorial that dubbed him an astute businessman after he requested MNS chief Raj Thackeray not to contest the Lok Sabha elections as unfortunate and uncalled for
item.itunes:subtitle: Former BJP president Nitin Gadkari on Thursday described the Saamna editorial that dubbed him an astute businessman after he requested MNS chief Raj Thackeray not to contest the Lok Sabha elections as unfortunate and uncalled for

item.title: NPP prez writes letter to BJP proposes to join NDA
item.description: National Peoples Party NPP national president PA Sangma has shown keen interest in joining National Democratic Alliance NDA and has written letter to Bhartiya Janata Party BJP national president Rajnath Singh senior BJP leader LK Advani and to BJP prime ministerial candidate Narendra Modi
item.itunes:subtitle: National Peoples Party NPP national president PA Sangma has shown keen interest in joining National Democratic Alliance NDA and has written letter to Bhartiya Janata Party BJP national president Rajnath Singh senior BJP leader LK Advani and to BJP prime m

item.title: Andhra Pradesh exCM Kiran Reddy floats new party
item.description: After a prolonged deliberation running into weeks exchief minister of Andhra Pradesh N Kiran Kumar Reddy has announced forming a new party to uphold the selfrespect of the Telugu people

item.title: Modi is vikaspurush for only Adanis and Ambanis Kejriwal
item.description: Escalating his attack against BJPs prime ministerial candidate Narendra Modi over his development claims AAP leader Arvind Kejriwal on Thursday said he is vikaspurush development man only for industrialists
